articles.author: Livemint
articles.title: 'Cosmic dance of fire and ice': European Space Agency shares stunning photos of 'mysterious' star system | Today News - Mint
articles.description: The European Space Agency reveals a ’mysterious’ star system called Mira HM Sge, located 3,400 light-years away. The system features a red giant and a white dwarf engaged in a ’cosmic dance of fire and ice’.
articles.content: The European Space Agency has left netizens in awe after sharing a glimpse of the mysterious Mira HM Sge star system on Friday. The symbiotic star is located 3,400 light-years away in the Sagitta con… [+1904 chars]
